title: Space-a Art chanchin tawi - Orbital Temple
heading: Space-a Art chanchin tawi te
intro: Kum 1957 -a artificial satellite hlawhtling taka kahchhuah hmasak ber aṭang khan satellite sang sawm chuang zet chu khawvel hi an rawn vel tawh a ni. He hun tharah hian artist-te chuan an practice tihzauh theihna tur kawng an hmu a, outer space chu canvas chi thar a lo ni ta a ni. Chumi rual chuan space exploration politics chungchangah zawhna bulpui tak tak a lo chhuak ta a ni - mahse, hmun tam zawk chu cover a la ni lo.

leonov.text: Space-a artwork siam hmasak ber chu khawvel chunga ni chhuahna lem a ni a, Russian astronaut Alexei Leonov- a’n kum 1965- a Voskhod 2-a a chuan laiin a siam a ni.
leonov.caption: Space-a art siam hmasak ber, leh Alexei Leonov-a’n a lem a hman pencil te. Thlalak: Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center-a Museum-a thil awmte a ni

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Kum thum hnuah Moon Museum , ceramic plate te tak te, Thla chungah a tla nia sawi a ni a, chutih laia US-a mithiam lar ber paruk: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers leh Andy Warhol te ziah a ni.
moonMuseum.caption1: New York Times-a thuziak hmasa ber aṭanga Moon Museum thlalak. Thumb chuan Warhol-a lemziak chu a ti thim hle.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Warhol-a provocative contribution - top left - hian he project hi chutih laia communication media tan chuan harsatna a siam a ni.
moonMuseum.caption2: New York Times-in tihchhuah a thlan thlalak, a hnuaiah hian artwork hmuh tur a awm a, a chung veilam sir ah Andy Warhol-a lemziak a awm bawk.

fallenAstronaut.text: Kum 1971 khan Apollo 15 astronaut David Scott chuan Thla ah hian humanoid aluminum sculpture te tak te Fallen Astronaut tih chu a dah a . Belgian artist Paul Van Hoeydonck chuan he piece hmang hian space exploration hmasawnna kawnga astronaut leh cosmonaut thi tawhte hriatrengna atan hman a tum a ni.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Hadley-Apennine landing site-a thla chunga dah Commemorative plaque hmuhnawm.

pioneerVoyager.text: Kum 1970 chhoah , Pioneer Plaques leh Voyager Probes te pahnih hian space-a art tan kawng thar an siam a. Lei atanga hmuh theih thuchah ziakna rangkachak-anodized aluminum plaque te chu nakin lawka spacefarer dang tu pawh hmu thei tur hnenah phurin, mihring nun chu a bulpui ber berteah an tarlang a ni.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Pioneer 10 leh 11 plaque, kum 1970 chhoa hmun thuk takah phurh luh a ni.

dove.text: Kum 1990 khan Brazil chuan he ram chhungah hian a chhinchhiahna a hnutchhiah a, DOVE/OSCAR-17 , amateur satellite fing tak, poetic power ropui tak nei a ni. A siamtu hian artist anga inngai lo mah se, hla thuk tak a ni: remna dilna naupang aw chu a record a, khawvel puma radio amateur sang hnih chuang hnenah a thawn a, hmahruaitu CubeSat chu sound work-ah a chantir ta a ni.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, Brazil rama poetic satellite hmanga naupang aw remna zawnga thawn chhuah, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Kum 2012 khan artist Trevor Paglen chuan "The Last Pictures" , micro-etched disc a tichhuak a, geostationary orbit-a Echostar XVI communications satellite-a thlalak 100 dah a ni. Kum tluklehdingawn tam tak daih tura duan a nih avangin, nakin hun hla tak atana archaeological artifact anga mihring civilization aia rei zawka awm tura ruahman a ni.
lastPictures.caption: Mihringte aia rei zawka siam, micro-etched disc, The Last Pictures chu kum 2012 khan tlangzarh a ni.

ulises.text: Kum 2015 khan Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) chuan Ulises I , nanosatellite chu artist Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús kaihhruaina hnuaia conceptual opera anga ngaihtuah a ni. He satellite hi Feria del Libro de Guadalajara hunlai khan balloon hmangin stratosphere-ah an phur a ni. Darkar li vel chhunga puak thei tur leh parachute hmanga chhuk thei tura duan a ni.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, Colectivo Espacial Mexicano-in a siam, conceptual satellite opera a ni.

artsat.text: Kum 2014 khan purely artistic satellite hmasa ber chu kahchhuah a ni. University of Tokyo-a ARTSAT-1 Invader project chuan khawvelah spatial data a thawn a, chu chu art installation leh music siamnaah hman a ni.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader framework leh spare parts khawvela la awmte.
artsat.caption2: mission [SPACE x ART] − beyond Cosmologies exhibition chu Museum of Contemporary Art Tokyo-ah neih a ni

kac.text: Brazilian leh American contemporary artist Eduardo Kac hian NASA leh SpaceX te thawhhona hmangin space art lamah a thawhhlawk hle a ni . A "Inner Telescope" ( 2017 ), French astronaut Thomas Pesquet nen an siam a, International Space Station -a chuang chunga lemziak siam a ni.
kac.caption: International Space Station-a Inner Telescope, French astronaut Thomas Pesquet nena siam, kum 2017-a siam.

enoch.text: Kum 2018 khan art project anga siam passive CubeSat chu orbit-ah an thlawh tir a. Bahamian conceptual artist Tavares Strachan -a siam a ni a, Enoch hian 24-karat-gold canopic jar a nei a, African-American astronaut hmasa ber Robert Henry Lawrence Jr -a bust a awm bawk.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (display unit), kum 2015-2017 chhung khan a awm a. R Tavares Strachan, thlalak l Museum Associates/LACMA te chuan an ziak a.

orbitalReflector.text: Chumi kum vek chuan Trevor Paglen-a Orbital Reflector chu nonfunctional CubeSat-a dah sculpture angin an tlangzarh bawk. Chu hnathawh chu khawvela kan hmun kan hmuh dan thlak danglam tumna artistic gesture a ni. Deploy dik tak a ni lo. A ruahman angin hawn ngai lo mah se, inbiakna pawimawh tak tak a siam a, khawvel puma astronomer, scientist, media outlet, zirtirtute, zirlai, leh mipui zahawm takte hnen aṭanga chhân lêtna nasa tak a dawng a, chu chuan art hlawhtling tak chu technically-a hlawhtling a ngai lo tih a târ lang a ni.
orbitalReflector.caption: Orbital Reflector hmanga Digital Rendering, 2018-a hman tur a ni

others.text: Artist dang tam tak pawhin space art field-ah hian an thawhhlawk hle a, an zirchiannaah hian thlirna danglam tak tak an rawn keng tel vek a ni. Project langsar tak takte chu Sarah Jane Pell-i’n astronaut artist-in a zirchianna, boruak khirh tak takah mihring performance a chhui dan; Agnes Meyer-Brandis-i Moon Goose Analogue project-ah hian history leh tunlai space exploration narratives te a zirchiang a; Nahum-a AstroArts program hmanga artistic microgravity experiment neih theihna tur; leh Arthur Woods-a Cosmic Dancer lem, kum 1993-a Mir station-a space-a phochhuah hmasak ber a ni.

orbitalTemple.text: Kum 2025 -ah kum 4 chhung zet zirchianna leh hmasawnna an neih hnuah Brazilian artist Edson Pavoni leh a thawhpui pawl hrang hrangte chuan Orbital Temple , khawvela tu pawh orbit-a hming thawn turin a sawm a, hei hian ramri kaltlanga hriatrengna radically inclusive a siam ang.
orbitalTemple.caption: Mercosul Bienal-a Orbital Temple-ah hian a awm a. Thlalak hi Clara Marques-i a ni

imageAlts.leonov: Alexei Leonov-a lemziak leh pencil hmanga siam a ni
imageAlts.moonMuseum: Thla Museum-a ceramic wafer siam a ni
imageAlts.moonMuseumWarhol: Moon Museum ceramic wafer ah hian artwork zawng zawng a lang vek

imageAlts.artsatArt: ARTSAT-1 data atanga artwork siam a ni

imageAlts.orbitalReflector: Trevor Paglen-a Orbital Reflector hmanga siam a ni
imageAlts.orbitalTemple: Orbital Temple Satellite hmanga siam a ni
